full_summary:
**Government Tender Notice: IT Professionals**

**Solicitation Number:** W6399-23-LK68/A
**Publication Date:** July 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** August 7, 2023

The Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting proposals for the services of multiple IT professionals under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Service (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number EN578-170432. This solicitation is open to pre-qualified suppliers, including ADGA Group Consultants Inc., ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp., and others.

**Services Required:**

* 1 x Project Manager (L3)
* 2 x Project Managers (L2)
* 2 x Technology Architects (L3)
* 1 x Technical Writer (L3)
* 1 x Project Leader (L2)
* 1 x Telecommunication System Specialist (L3)

The expected term of the contract is three (3) years, with no option to extend.

**Security Requirements:**

* Security Clearance required: Top Secret/Secret
* Security Level required (Document Safeguarding): None
* Citizenship Restriction: Canadian

**Location of Work:**

* Region: National Capital Region
* Specific Location: Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) facilities in the National Capital Region

**Instructions for Bidders:**

* Bidders must provide the required information in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* RFP documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to pre-qualified suppliers.
* The TBIPS Method of Supply provides suppliers with an on-going opportunity to become pre-qualified for participation in future bidding opportunities.

**Notice Web-link:** Not available.

**Points of Contact:**

* Jennifer Ouellet, Contracting Authority
* Email: jennifer.ouellet2@forces.gc.ca
* Telephone: (343) 598-1547

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Note that I have excluded irrelevant information such as the list of pre-qualified suppliers, statement of results in "resulting contract clauses", and emails one would write to a certain Jennifer person. These changes have been made for the professionals and readers with interest in further detailed information.    There could be more supplimentary materials to
